title: Awaz App launched for reporting missing children, rights violations
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 04 (APP): The newly developed Awaz App enables users to report human rights violations, including cases of missing or abducted children, an official from the Ministry of Human Rights told here Sunday.
Talking to APP, he mentioned that the App ensures a swift and coordinated response from authorities and community organizations. “We are proud to introduce the Awaz App, a significant milestone in our ongoing commitment to human rights,” he added.
“It highlights our dedication to utilizing technology for prompt and effective action on every report, ensuring justice with unwavering resolve,” he said and added, the Awaz App is currently available for download on Android, with an iOS version coming soon. Let’s make a difference together!
